engagementModelsData.heading: Flexible & Tailored Engagement Models
engagementModelsData.description: We offer flexible engagement models to suit your specific project needs. Whether you’re looking for a fixed-cost solution, a dedicated team, or a hybrid approach, we have the right model to drive your success.

models.title: Fixed-Cost Model
models.text: Perfect for projects with a clear scope and timeline, offering cost predictability and well-defined deliverables.

models.title: Dedicated Team Model
models.text: Hire dedicated experts for flexible, exclusive, and collaborative project support.

models.title: Hybrid Model
models.text: Get a dedicated team with fixed milestones and costs for each project phase.

mainEntity.name: What services does IT United offer?

acceptedAnswer.text: IT United offers comprehensive software development services including AI-powered solutions, custom software development, enterprise software development, MVP development, mobile app development, web development, CRM solutions, e-commerce solutions, and IT consulting services. We specialize in building scalable, secure, and high-performance digital solutions tailored to your business needs.

mainEntity.name: What technologies does IT United use?

acceptedAnswer.text: IT United leverages cutting-edge technologies including React JS, Angular, Vue.js, Node.js, Python, Java, PHP, Flutter, React Native, Swift, Android, iOS, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, AWS, Azure, and many more. We use a versatile tech stack tailored to each project's specific requirements to deliver future-ready solutions.

mainEntity.name: What engagement models does IT United provide?

acceptedAnswer.text: IT United offers three flexible engagement models: Fixed-Cost Model for projects with clear scope and timeline, Dedicated Team Model for hiring dedicated experts with exclusive collaboration, and Hybrid Model combining dedicated teams with fixed milestones and costs for each project phase. We tailor our approach to suit your specific project needs.

mainEntity.name: How long does it take to develop an MVP?

acceptedAnswer.text: The timeline for MVP development varies based on project complexity and requirements. Typically, a basic MVP can be developed in 8-12 weeks, while more complex solutions may take 12-16 weeks. We follow our proven 5-step development methodology to ensure efficient delivery without compromising quality.

mainEntity.name: Does IT United provide post-launch support?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, IT United provides comprehensive post-launch support including testing, deployment, maintenance, updates, bug fixes, and continuous optimization. We ensure your product performs flawlessly and evolves with your business needs through dedicated support and enhancement services.

mainEntity.name: What is IT United's development methodology?

acceptedAnswer.text: IT United follows a proven 5-step development methodology: Discover (understanding goals and vision), Planning (defining scope and strategies), Design (crafting intuitive user experiences), Development (building robust solutions), and Delivery (testing, deployment, and continuous support). This structured approach ensures precision from initial discovery to final delivery.

mainEntity.name: How can AI-powered solutions benefit my business?

acceptedAnswer.text: AI-powered solutions from IT United can save 40+ hours every week through intelligent automation, enhance security with 24/7 monitoring, accelerate code deployment by 10x, and grow sales 3x smarter through data-driven insights. Our AI workflows handle repetitive tasks, allowing your team to focus on innovation and strategic initiatives.

mainEntity.name: Which industries does IT United serve?

acceptedAnswer.text: IT United serves diverse industries including Startups, Education, Healthcare, E-commerce, Real Estate, Fintech, NGOs, and more. We have successfully delivered 930+ projects across 30+ countries, providing tailored solutions that drive digital transformation for businesses worldwide, from startups to enterprises.
